createTime.description: Time the test matrix was created.

state.title: Test State
state.description: Possible test states for a test matrix.

invalidMatrixDetails.description: Code that describes why the test matrix is considered invalid. Only set for matrices in the INVALID state.

outcomeSummary.title: Outcome Summary
outcomeSummary.description: Outcome summary for a finished test matrix.

resultStorage.description: Locations where test results are stored.

clientInfo.description: Information provided by the client that created the test matrix.

testMatrixId.description: ID of the test matrix this event belongs to.

TestMatrixEventData.title: Test Matrix Event Data
TestMatrixEventData.description: The data within all Firebase test matrix events.

details.description: Map of detailed information about the client.

ClientInfo.title: Client Info
ClientInfo.description: Information about the client which invoked the test.

toolResultsHistory.description: Tool Results history resource containing test results. Format is `projects/{project_id}/histories/{history_id}`. See https://firebase.google.com/docs/test-lab/reference/toolresults/rest for more information.

toolResultsExecution.description: Tool Results execution resource containing test results. Format is `projects/{project_id}/histories/{history_id}/executions/{execution_id}`. Optional, can be omitted in erroneous test states. See https://firebase.google.com/docs/test-lab/reference/toolresults/rest for more information.

resultsUri.description: URI to the test results in the Firebase Web Console.

gcsPath.description: Location in Google Cloud Storage where test results are written to. In the form "gs://bucket/path/to/somewhere".

ResultStorage.title: Result Storage
ResultStorage.description: Locations where test results are stored.
